name: Mini White Jackal Pup
description:
Mini jackal pups are handcrafted with specially selected runes to be the perfect eternal puppy.
Combine 1 White and 2 Blue Mini Jackal Pups with 12 Unidentified Dyes in the Mystic Forge to create a Mini Silver Jackal Pup.
Combine 1 White and 2 Silver Mini Jackal Pups with 20 Unidentified Dyes in the Mystic Forge to create a Mini Aqua Jackal Pup.
